text: Sokode kare (zakarīyā) wa itta. `Omo yo, watashi ni shirushi o o shimeshi kudasai.' Kare (tenshi) wa itta. `Anata wa 3-nichi no ma ningen to hanasu koto ga dekizu, mi fu dake de ishi o tsūji saseru koto ni narou. Kore ga anata ni atae rareru shirushidearu. Dakara ōku anata no omo o nen shi, asa ni ta be ni tatae nasai
